summary:
DawnGuard required
A pesonalized version of the Dawnguard dragonbone dagger
descriptionHtml:
DawnGuard required

A pesonalized version of the Dawnguard dragonbone dagger
Craftable in Dragon smithing; does not replace the dragonbone dagger

Uninstall/Delete old version prior to installing a newer one
Please view available files in download section

download the veersion you want in the download section

Standard version has the same stats as a dragonbone dagger
Dragon armor perk requied to craft & temper
requires 1 dragon bone, 1 gold ingot & 1 leather strips


Enhanced version:
Base damage increased from 12 to 16
critical damage increased from 6 to 8
faster - 1.3 to 1.9
enchanted with absorb health 4
can\'t drop
ignores normal resistance
removed dragon armor smithing perk requirement

Replacer version - Replaces the vanilla dragonbone dagger with the enhanced version (with scabbard)

reviewed file with TESEdit 3.0.26 - plugin is clean
should not have any conflicts & can go anywhere in the load order


Install with Nexus Mod Manager
or
Extract dragonborndagger.esp & dragonborndagger.bsa to your Skyrim\\ Data directory

Uninstall with Nexus Mod Manager
or
Delete dragonborndagger.esp & dragonborndagger.bsa from your Skyrim\\ Data directory
author: scrapperrm

files.name: Dragonborn Dagger scabbard- enhanced
files.changelogHtml:
corrected imagemaps; tweaked in nifskpoe
changed scabbard to black on black

files.name: Dragonborn Dagger scabbard- Replacer
files.changelogHtml: Added a version that replaces the dragonbone dagger
